title: Homemade Sourdough Bread
description: Artisan sourdough bread with a crispy crust and chewy interior. This recipe uses a simple sourdough starter and requires minimal kneading for authentic rustic bread.
chefNotes: The key to great sourdough is patience and a healthy starter. Feed your starter regularly and give the dough plenty of time to develop flavor during the bulk fermentation.

steps.instruction: In a large bowl, mix sourdough starter, water, and flour until a shaggy dough forms.
Cover and let rest for 30 minutes (autolyse method).
Add salt and knead for 10 minutes until smooth and elastic.
Place in a lightly oiled bowl, cover, and let rise at room temperature for 4-6 hours until doubled.
Fold dough every hour during bulk fermentation for better structure.
Shape into a round loaf and place in a proofing basket or bowl lined with a floured towel.
Cover and refrigerate overnight (8-12 hours) for cold fermentation.
Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C) with a Dutch oven inside for 30 minutes.
Score the top of the dough with a sharp knife and carefully place in the hot Dutch oven.
Bake covered for 30 minutes, then uncover and bake for 15 more minutes until deep golden brown.
